div.pre: 2033 Carife (near anc. Aeclanum), 24 km. (206) SE of Benevento, Samnium, 1895 Burial: late 3rd cent. B.C. (Crawford) Contents: 13 AR, 103 AE. In two pots Aquilonia: 1 AE Neapolis: 2 st.; 42 AE Phistelia?: 1 ob. Arpi: 27 AE Salapia: 2 AE Brundisium: 1 AE Taras: 2 st. Heracleia: 5 ob. Thurium: 3 ob. Mamertines: 3 AE Syracuse: 2 AE Unc.: 2 AE Roman Rep.: 23 AE (see Crawford) Disposition: dispersed de Petra, NSc 1896, p. 210 Thomsen, ERC I, p. 117 Crawford, RRCH 50
